sourcesContent:
Bienvenido a VELAIO
Ingrese al portal haciendo click!
Ingresar al menú principal
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router, NavigationEnd } from '@angular/router'; import { filter } from 'rxjs/operators'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'prueba_tecnica_velaio'; mostrarContenido = true; constructor(private router: Router){ if(this.router.routerState.snapshot.url!==''){ this.mostrarContenido = true; }else{ this.mostrarContenido = false; console.log(this.mostrarContenido); } } }
